channel.title: Need ip ban
channel.description: Could someone help me with an ip ban command? The one on my server only bans their character, thank you.

item.title: Need ip ban
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

Idk a command, but, for no-ip, just find their ip (click the “connectedfrom” folder, and paste their ip address in “bannedips.txt”

Read full topic

item.title: Need ip ban
item.dc:creator: @pmgz2 pmgz2
item.description:
@pmgz2 wrote:

Hes not using hamachi is he?..

I have a command, but it won’t work for you unfortunately.

But fortunately you can do this. go into your characters folder, and look for the ip they last connected from. then go to folder “data” or where ever your server reads bannedips from. and open the .txt file/.xml and paste the ip in and save and close. just go back on your server if hes still online, kick him, and he can’t make no more accounts or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Need ip ban
item.dc:creator: @Kongfu Kongfu
item.description:
@Kongfu wrote:

ah, ok thanks :(. I’m actually using no-ip so I can’t do that. when I ::banuser they just make a new account, so I developed a jail and send them there with mute on. Still they can make a new account though, it’s annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Need ip ban
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

if u use Hamachi u can see ip, but for no-ip…not sure…if u have ham and u click on char file, u can see ip…and ban them in hamachi…not sure about no-ip cause they have this long thing,
